morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does to oneself or for oneself
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.genderExplained: they are female or take a feminine form
morphInfos.description: something of women that _are doing themselves_ good
morphInfos.explanation: an action that is done to or for female people or things that something belongs to
